scripts.dev: npm run docker:mongo && npm run dev:lite
scripts.dev:lite: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run serve --workspace=packages/ui" "npm run dev --workspace=packages/backend"
scripts.docker:mongo: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml --env-file packages/backend/.env.development up -d && npx wait-port localhost:27017 --timeout 30000
scripts.version: npm run test && npm version $npm_package_version --no-git-tag-version --workspaces && git add .
scripts.postversion: git push && git push origin tag v$npm_package_version
